ComicInfo.Summary: In this issue all the stops are out as the lovely and lethal Nikita goes it alone. Her mission? Lead a one woman assault on the Lamia Spire headquarters, to rescue her partner Milo being held captive there. Harlan Ceroke is alive and well, in a manner of speaking, and he and Lisa Rubric, the head of Lamia, are the ones holding Milo. They're not going to let him go without a fight...a fight to the death, if they have their way. Of course, since they're undead, and hate to lose, that means Nikita and Milo's death. The drug Ceroke injected in Nikita has instilled her with vampire traits, and now instead of spurning the instincts she despises, she's forced to embrace them in order to save her partner's life. The cost? Far more than she ever bargained for, but so little compared to Milo.

ComicInfo.Title: The Turning of Her Silent Heart
